pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā cetiyesu cārikaṃ caramāno yena bhaddavatikā tena pāyāsi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.2: Addasaṃsu kho gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.5: Ambatitthe, bhante, jaṭilassa assame nāgo paṭivasati iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.9: tatiyampi kho gopālakā pasupālakā kassakā pathāvino bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.11: Ambatitthe, bhante, jaṭilassa assame nāgo paṭivasati iddhimā āsiviso ghoraviso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.14: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena bhaddavatikā tadavasari.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.16: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato yena ambatitthassa jaṭilassa assamo tenupasaṅkami;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.17: upasaṅkamitvā agyāgāraṃ pavisitvā tiṇasanthārakaṃ paññapetvā nisīdi pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.18: Addasā kho so nāgo āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ paviṭṭhaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.21: Atha kho so nāgo makkhaṃ asahamāno pajjali.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.23: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato tassa nāgassa tejasā tejaṃ pariyādiyitvā yena bhaddavatikā tenupasaṅkami.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.24: Atha kho bhagavā bhaddavatikāyaṃ yathābhirantaṃ viharitvā yena kosambī tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.26: “ayyo kira sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saddhiṃ saṅgāmesī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.27: Atha kho bhagavā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno yena kosambī tadavasari.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.28: Atha kho kosambikā upāsakā bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ karitvā yenāyasmā sāgato tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.29: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.30: Ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho kosambikā upāsakā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.31: “kiṃ, bhante, ayyānaṃ dullabhañca manāpañca, kiṃ paṭiyādemā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.32: Evaṃ vutte, chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kosambike upāsake etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.33: “atthāvuso, kāpotikā nāma pasannā bhikkhūnaṃ dullabhā ca manāpā ca, taṃ paṭiyādethā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.34: Atha kho kosambikā upāsakā ghare ghare kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ paṭiyādetvā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ disvāna āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.35: “pivatu, bhante, ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ, pivatu, bhante, ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṃ pasannan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.36: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato ghare ghare kāpotikaṃ pasannaṃ pivitvā nagaramhā nikkhamanto nagaradvāre paripati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.37: Atha kho bhagavā sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ nagaramhā nikkhamanto addasa āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ nagaradvāre paripatantaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.40: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paṭissuṇitvā āyasmantaṃ sāgataṃ ārāmaṃ netvā yena bhagavā tena sīsaṃ katvā nipātesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.41: Atha kho āyasmā sāgato parivattitvā yena bhagavā tena pāde karitvā seyyaṃ kappesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.43: “nanu, bhikkhave, pubbe sāgato tathāgate sagāravo ahosi sappatisso”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.45: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, sāgato etarahi tathāgate sagāravo sappatisso”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.47: “Nanu, bhikkhave, sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saddhiṃ saṅgāmesī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.49: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, sāgato etarahi pahoti nāgena saddhiṃ saṅgāmetun”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.51: “Api nu kho, bhikkhave, taṃ pātabbaṃ yaṃ pivitvā visaññī assā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.53: “Ananucchavikaṃ, bhikkhave, sāgatassa ananulomikaṃ appatirūpaṃ assāmaṇakaṃ akappiyaṃ akaraṇīyaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.54: Kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, sāgato majjaṃ pivissati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.55: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:1.56: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc51:2.3.2: amajjañca hoti majjavaṇṇaṃ majjagandhaṃ majjarasaṃ taṃ pivati, sūpasampāke, maṃsasampāke, telasampāke, āmalakaphāṇite, amajjaṃ ariṭṭhaṃ pivati, ummattakassa, ādikammikassāti.
